participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to explore and play.
participant_1.background: i am in the third grade. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys reading and learning.
participant_2.background: i read a book every week. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
